description: A simple yet polished personal website to showcase your skills, projects, and resume.
Simple weather app that shows the current weather and forecast for the next 5 days.
A simple to-do list app that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks.
A simple calculator app that can perform basic arithmetic operations.
A blog website where users can create, edit, and delete posts.
An e-commerce website where users can browse products, add them to cart, and checkout.
A real-time chat app with user authentication, message history, and notifications.
An app that allows users to search for recipes based on ingredients they have at home.
An app to track personal expenses, categorize them, and visualize spending trends.
A photo gallery app where users can upload, view, and organize their photos.
An app that lets users take quizzes, track scores, and see correct answers after completing the quiz.
An app that tracks fitness activities like walking, running, or cycling, and visualizes progress.
A simple music player app with the ability to play, pause, and skip tracks from a playlist.
An app that lets users search for movies and shows, displaying details like ratings, plot, and cast.
An app that converts markdown text into HTML for easy formatting and previewing.
A job listing website where users can post and apply for jobs, with search and filtering capabilities.
A tool that allows users to convert between different currencies in real-time using an API.
An advanced to-do list app with project management features like deadlines, priorities, and progress tracking.
A virtual pet app where users can feed, play, and care for a virtual pet.
A platform where users can share, discover, and rate recipes.
A web app that allows users to save, organize, and search for their favorite code snippets.
A notes app that syncs across devices, with features like categorization and search.
